tribe_name: Enterprise Rancheria of Maidu Indians of California

awards.description: APPROVES THE FY 2025 TCR INITIAL CONTRACT PROPOSAL, SCOPE OF WORK & BUDGET. AWARDS FY 2025 TCR FUNDS.

DESCRIPTION:THIS AGREEMENT PROVIDES ASSISTANCE TO ENTERPRISE RANCHERIA TO BUILD ITS CAPACITY TO ADMINISTER MULTI-MEDIA ENVIRONMENTAL PROGRAMS ON INDIAN LANDS. 

THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT PROVIDES FULL FEDERAL FUNDING IN THE AMOUNT OF $111,424.ACTIVITIES:THE RECIPIENT WILL REACH OUT TO TRIBAL COMMUNITY TO REVIEW THE DRAFT CLIMATE CHANGE ADAPTATION PLAN; EVALUATE AND AMEND OUTREACH AND EDUCATION EFFORTS REGARDING WATER CONSERVATION; AND EVALUATE THE NEED FOR AN AIR MONITORING PROGRAM IN COLLABORATION WITH OTHER LOCAL TRIBES.SUBRECIPIENT:NO SUBAWARDS ARE INCLUDED IN THIS ASSISTANCE AGREEMENT.OUTCOMES:ANTICIPATED DELIVERABLES AND OUTCOMES INCLUDE AN UPDATED CLIMATE CHANGE ADAPTATION PLAN; AMENDED WATER CONSERVATION OUTREACH AND EDUCATION; AND A DETERMINATION BY THE TRIBE ABOUT WHETHER TO PURSUE CLEAN AIR ACT FUNDING FOR MONITORING. DIRECT BENEFICIARIES OF THIS PROGRAM ARE THE MEMBERS AND/OR RESIDENTS OF THE ENTERPRISE RANCHERIA.
